synthesis_conditions.additional_information: No M2+ ions were incorporated into the structure, but their presence facilitated the formation of the Ti-oxo clusters. Dry solvents or an inert atmosphere were not required.

synthesis_conditions.drying_method: activated by evacuation at 80 88C following the exchange of guest solvents in the as-synthesized sample with fresh acetone
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The reaction gave dark red-brown microcrystals. High TCPP purity is critical for obtaining single crystals. Ti-oxide/hydroxide formation was completely prohibited.
